name: TimeTracker
0:
”Alexa, start Time Tracker and begin tracking”
”Alexa, start Time Tracker and finish tracking”
”Alexa, ask Time Tracker how much time I spent on Working today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time tracker
Developer Terms of Use (German, DE)
des:
Using the skill is simple:
You can start and stop the tracking with easy voice commands. Then, you can ask Alexa how much time you spent on something.

Features:
- Tracking by projects: If you track the same thing multiple times, Alexa can add the time up
- You can ask for the time consumpltion on any day

Other highlights:
- At the end of a record, Alexa tells you the time by herself
- To prevent misunderstandings, Alexa makes sure she has understood the project name correctly
- The current tracking can be aborted

The skill is still young and is likely to receive updates and improvements in the near future. If you have any suggestions, please tell me :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy (German, DE)
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
